entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11 except minus 15 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11 except minus 15 inland. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
